Name: 逃出囚笼 Rush Out Of The Room
About the game: What kind of work is it? This is a casual puzzle game. Games are pixelated. How to play the game? Players through the game left key to rotate the left props bar all kinds of props and create on the map to let the protagonist through the road, reach the final destination to pass, in the way of pass, the player should eat more fruit, get the key to pass, and avoid obstacles and move the enemy.If the player hits an obstacle or moves an enemy, the game is over. How to play games to save money The standard price of the game is $1.99, the people 11 yuan, the game is discounted in the early release, if you want to save money, you can buy during the promotion How to deal with the problem? You can contribute in the steam comment section to help us improve, or send us your comments via customer service email。
